page.title: 08IMPORTANT PEOPLE,NAILSWORTH
page.content: {Mrs.Mills}is Nailsworth's Mayor. She became a Councillor in 1973 and 2 years ago she became Mayor. She has studied Nailsworth and imparts a lot of information to the town's tourists. At the moment she is writing a new guide book. Another person of interest is { {William Beeston.}He owns a delicatessen which has a very high reputation. {Willam }trained for 3 years, worked for Trusthouse Forte and finished in Switzerland. { {Victor May}is Nailsworth's town crier. He entered a competition in Jubilee year,1977, to become a Town crier. He won the competition and has been one ever since. He wears a special costume. Before becoming a town crier he was a window cleaner.
